title: [BUG] [UWP] Canvas is blank after PopAsync() from Navigation in Forms
body:
**Description**

Canvas is blank after PopAsync() from Navigation in Forms

**Code**

This shows nothing after moving away and back
```csharp
        private void Mv_PaintSurface(object sender, SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.SKPaintGLSurfaceEventArgs e)
        {
            e.Surface.Canvas.DrawRect(100, 100, 500, 500, new SKPaint { Color = SKColors.Pink });
        }
```

**Expected Behavior**

A pink square is shown.

**Actual Behavior**

Screen stays blank.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  
  - ❌ 1.68.2-preview.50
  - ❌ 1.68.2-preview.29
  - ❌ 1.68.1.1 (latest stable)
  - ❌ 1.68.1
  - ✔️ 1.68.0

- IDE:  Visual Studio 
- Platform Target Frameworks: UWP with SKGLView
- UWP: 16299

**Reproduction Link**

Here a sample to reproduce it. Instructions in the readme.
https://github.com/pauldendulk/skiasharp-uwp-blank-screen
Thanks to @spaddlewit for providing the original one submitted for Mapsui.
